name: Portal Combat
description:
Use portals to defeat your enemy.  Guess what, your enemy can destroy the portals. Guess what, you can slow down time. Guess what, you are about to play the greatest crossover game in the history of video games. 

Music by Ansimuz (ansimuz.itch.io) and 8 bit universe

Graphics - Aishwarya Omar, Nokzendi Aier, Rahul Chembakasseril

Scripting and level design- Pushpendra Singh
